abstract: Tech companies, civil liberties groups and media organizations are planning to back Microsoft’s resistance to government attempts to snoop on customers.
snippet: Tech companies, civil liberties groups and media organizations are planning to back Microsoft’s resistance to government attempts to snoop on customers.
lead_paragraph: SEATTLE — Dozens of allies threw their weight behind Microsoft on Friday in a case that challenges law enforcement’s use of secrecy orders to cloak its pursuit of digital communications in investigations.

headline.main: Microsoft’s Challenge to Government Secrecy Wins Dozens of Supporters
headline.print_headline: Microsoft’s Legal Challenge to Government Secrecy Wins Dozens of Supporters
